name: Sniper Shoot Skyscraper
description:
Sniper Shoot Skyscraper is a 3D FPS interesting shooting game . The Game Sniper gun shooter includes full dangerous thrilling entertainment package. Aim the target and shoot it as soon as possible. Be a silent part war, be the sniper. Take a gun which you like and have a great collection of gun. Thrilling missions, awesome visuals and entertaining gameplay.
- Save life from enemy shooters.
- Realistic 3D graphics and cool animations
- Epic-Story driven gameplay.
- Real shooting feeling.
- Various unique and thrilling missions with suspance.
- Modern and forensic weapon assets.
